title: League of Legends Packet Loss (PLEASE HELP)

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: The Image is the Log Reader and it shows packet loss, I'm not sure how to fix it. Can anyone please help me?

replies.body: Hey there, I'm sure this is causing you some pretty sudden spikes in-game.  Try out the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot this, but do it in a custom game to stay safe!
